root.Bulleted: Oral Questions to the Secretary of State for Education

QuestionRestart.QnText: What steps she is taking to improve support for children with special educational needs and disabilities.

Question.QnText: What assessment she has made of trends in the number of apprenticeship achievements.
What recent assessment her Department has made of the adequacy of SEND provision.
If her Department will make an assessment of the potential impact of sports and PE on mental resilience in young people.
What steps she is taking to improve support for children with special educational needs and disabilities.

What steps her Department has taken to improve standards of reading in schools.
What steps her Department is taking to encourage take-up of degree-level apprenticeships.
What assessment she has made of the potential impact of the Plan 5 student loan repayment plan on levels of applications for university undergraduate courses.

root.Bulleted: Topical Questions to the Secretary of State for Education

TopicalQuestionRestart.QnText: If she will make a statement on her departmental responsibilities.
